alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 4:33AM AKST until February 23 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...Through 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall will be inland. Rain will freeze on ground surfaces making travel difficult. Freezing rain will accumulate on elevated surfaces such as trees and power lines as well as accumulating on the ground.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
